question: The marked price of a watch is 1000 Rs. If a retailer buys this watch at 810 Rs. after getting two successive discounts of 10% and another rate which is illegible. What should be the second discount rate?
explanation:
Price after 10% first discount = $latex 1000\\times \\frac{100-10}{100}&s=1$
$latex => 1000\\times \\frac{90}{100} = 900 Rs.&s=1$
Price after second discount = 810 Rs.  (Given)
∴ Second discount = 900 - 810 = 90 Rs. 
∴ Percentage of second discount = $latex \\frac{90\\times 100}{900} = 10\\%&s=1$
Hence option [B] is the right answer.
